column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We love the deep dish here! Fresh tomato
column2: and it was a big sausage patty covering the top of the pizza
column3: not just small bits of sausages. There were alot of cheese which we love about. So it's very meaty and cheesy
column4: and we love both meat and cheese. The pie crust is crispy
column5: not soggy at all. The price was right. We got a medium pizza for under $20
column6: and the medium pizza is big and heavy enough. We were able to have left over for a second meal the other day. We love it! Be prepared for the long wait though
column7: but the wait was worth it. I recommend you to eat there when you visit Chicago
column8: it's a must! And if you are already in Chicago
column9: this is a must deep dish!
